评论详情: They are decent pants and I like the style but the sizing runs a tad bit small and they come in a much darker color than the picture if you order the blue ones. Not impressed.

My 11 year old picked these out because she likes the loose/baggy. These fit her perfectly, with growing room due to the comfortable, elastic weight. The material is good quality. After washing and air drying, they are still in good shape

评论概述: Size up if you have thick thighs
评论详情: I purchased a L which fits be for most other items but the inseam vs the rest of the pant leg is thinner making it easy to burst the seams (which I did at the crotch) on these if you have thick thighs or large hips. I can easily fix them but not everyone will want to or have the practical knowledge.
Needed some baggy black pants ordered one size bigger and it’s perfect
My son wears these alot. He is able to get the look of jeans, but with the comfort of sweats.

their so cute but i just have too fat of a ass to the point its a struggle to get these pants on. I ordered a large even but besides that being the only flaw its cute and comfortable unless you got a ass. then you gotta struggle to put theses on.
We ordered size Large but seems small. But nice style

Ordered these for my son, who is by all accounts height and size, a double extra large. These came in and do not even fit me, who is also tall, but where is a men’s small. Don’t order these. You will get something you don’t want.
Ordered a size medium and it was too small. Started return but have been waiting over a week for seller to send return mailing label. Very frustrated!!
These are well made but run extremely small
Ordered 2 sizes up from normal and didn't go over hips. Buyer beware!
Good quality fits great kid is happy . Looks like the late 90s lol

评论概述: Size was off by a lot

评论概述: I know Americans are bigger, but this is ridiculous.
评论详情: I'm a bigger guy, 6'3" and about 260lbs. So I figured 2xl stretchy pants would be a safe bet...... these came in so small that I gave them to my brothers girlfriend who is about 5'6" and 110lbs..... they fit her perfectly, so when ordering, make sure you order 5-10 xls bigger than you need
I bought a 3XL and it didn’t fit me. I let my medium size friend try it on and they fit her. Very disappointed. Don’t buy if you are a thicc woman.
